channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NY
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NY

item.title: Report E-2025040648
item.description:
Report E-2025040648

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-23T00:57:51+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-29
  • City: MONTGOMERY
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On April 29, 2025, two (2) 1.5-gallon jugs of UN2014 were damaged and released approximately less than one (<1) gallon of product to the trailer interior. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from Miller Environmental Group (MEG) to remediate the site. The crew utilized absorbents and hand tools to remediate the site. The damaged jugs were containerized in two (2) 5-gallon buckets and all impacted materials were containerized in one (1) 55-gallon drum.

item.title: Report E-2025040498
item.description:
Report E-2025040498

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-18T21:15:32+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-17
  • City: MASPETH
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: A. DUIE PYLE INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The forklift loader made an error loading the pallet which included the 4 hazmat boxes on to a platform inside the trailer when the boxes dropped off the pallet. The spilled product was absorbed by the packaging. The damaged containers were removed from their packages and placed in an overpack in preparation for disposition.

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0

  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0

  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: THIS PACKAGE WAS DISCOVERED IMMEDIATELY UPON OPENING THE TRAILER DOOR. CRUSHED AND LEAKING. UNLOADER PROMPTLY CALLED RESPONDER AND THE PACKAGE WAS CAREFULLY TRANSPORTED TO DMP FOR PROCESSING.
